body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, inmate. Arrested in Louisville, Kentucky, in September 1858. Convicted of possessing counterfeit money in Jefferson Circuit Court in October 1858. Inmate of the Kentucky State Penitentiary in Frankfort, Kentucky, from 1858 to 1860. Pardoned by Governor Beriah Magoffin on November 3, 1860.
